H0.text: Who was the first professional cricketer to captain England. W.G. Grace

H1.text: Who was the first professional cricketer to captain England. James Lillywhite

H2.text: Who was the first professional cricketer to captain England. Alfred Shaw

H3.text: Who was the first professional cricketer to captain England. L Hutton

A4.text: He became a professional cricketer, and played first-class cricket for Sussex from 1862 and 1883.

A5.text: He was the first ever captain of the English cricket team in a Test match, captaining two Tests against Australia in 1876â€“77.
